A mụrụ Athaliah Maoka Lesiba Molokomme na 4 Disemba 1959 na Francistown, Botswana
Ọ bụụrụ onye nke abụọ n’ime ụmụ itoolu ndị nkuzi Imelda Mishodzi Molokomme na Rufus Oka Kabiwa mụrụ.
Molokomme nwetara nzere na Mahadum Botswana na Swaziland
N'afọ 1983, ọ nwetara Masters na Iwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Yale Law na United States
O nwetakwara PhD na iwu na mahadum Leiden
Edemede ya, Children of the Fence: Ndokwa nke ụmụaka na-alụbeghị di na nwunye n'okpuru iwu na omume na Botswana, ka ebipụtara n'oge na-adịghị anya.
